observation: SouthWest AudioVisual: Phoenix, Arizona  Menu What We Do Who We Do It For How We Do It Where We Do It Contact Us Las Vegas, NV Los Angeles, CA San Diego, CA Phoenix, AZ Tucson, AZ Dallas, TX San Antonio, TX Albuquerque, NM We’ve been told we make a big deal out of stuff. Call it a gift. Boston, MA Right Left 1 2 3 Disneyland, Los Angeles, CA New Orleans, GA What For almost 50 years, SouthWest Audiovisual YOU NAME IT, WE’VE PROBABLY MADE A BIG DEAL OUT OF IT: Tradeshows Conventions Concerts Rallies Speeches Meetings Product Launches What’s Your Who Phoenix Arizona is where we call home, but the whole country is where we call work. We produce over 150 AV events a year, ranging from groups of 30 to conventions of over 18,000. Las Vegas, Los Angeles, San Diego, Tucson, Albuquerque, and of course Phoenix are just a few of the many places we regularly produce and coordinate shows. YOU’RE IN GOOD COMPANY: American Diabetes Association Arizona State Fair Oncology Nursing Society Make-a-Wish Foundation Infusion Nurses Society 3m Medical American Red Cross Cox Communications Sages Bridgestone / Firestone Gillette Hello Arizona Genentech Arthritis Foundation Honeywell Phoenix Union High School District Oracle Siemens Maricopa County Fair The Phoenix Group Fresenius Medical Care Association for Academic Surgery Arizona Dental Association Chandler Unified School District Arizona First Institute for Medical Education & Research Minimally Invasive Robotic Association Pacific Event Productions Arizona's Ultimate Womens Expo American Head & Neck Society Previous Next How From high resolution video, concert audio and intelligent lighting systems to your day-to-day meeting and presentation needs, our state of the art equipment will bring it home. AUDIO WE COORDINATE AND PACKAGE SYSTEMS TO PROVIDE: Line array concert sound Corporate production ballroom presentation Arena / amphitheatre environment LIGHTING LET US DESIGN AND PLOT A SYSTEM TO FIT YOUR NEEDS FROM: Conventional theatrical lighting Intelligent lighting Special effects VIDEO WE MAKE IT VISUALLY HAPPEN THROUGH: Single to multiple camera switching packages Front or rear screen presentations High resolution image magnification & content display SET DESIGN WE CAN CREATE THE ATMOSPHERE YOU DESIRE BY: Simple, yet effective custom draping and skirting Scrim and cyc backdrop enhancement Modular hard set designs Get in Touch (800) 266-SWAV Email av@swav.net Local Fax www.swav.net All content copyright 2022 Southwest Audiovisual. All rights reserved
